review: I got this AppleTV in order to stream movies from my iPad to my TV, especially Game of Thrones and YouTube videos which you can also play directly off the YouTube app built into the Apple TV operating system. The initial set up process was a little bit annoying but once I set it up it's very convenient to use and has no problems. For the price that is I strongly recommend this product
